channel.title: Am I even alllowed to post webclient questions?
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im having a little bit of trouble making a webclient and I was wondering if you could give me any tips. I did EVERYTHING like i was suppose to jared and signed it than it gave me the "cant find client.class" so I deleted all .javas and it still gave me the same error after i jared and signed it again.
Have you guys ever had that problem? Could you give me any tips or advice?
Thanks

item.title: Am I even alllowed to post webclient questions?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Lol good and thanks Maybe I’m just not jarring it correctly? (even though iIm sure I am.) or the client.jar has to be in the same folder as your “play now.html”?

Read full topic
item.source: Am I even alllowed to post webclient questions?

item.title: Am I even alllowed to post webclient questions?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

jal knight:

lol Well I see all these people asking for others to make webclients and none to help them wit hone so I wasnt sure if i was allowed to

That’s because the people were requesting for webclients, not help on how to make one. We don’t spoonfeed. Good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: Am I even alllowed to post webclient questions?
